english_example_sentence: You were going to fall while saving that small child on the icy road.
russian_example_sentence: Вы чуть не упали, спасая того маленького ребенка на обледенелой дороге.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz, buzlu yolda o küçük çocuğu kurtarırken düşecektiniz.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz, buzlu yolda o küçük çocuğu kurtarırken ______.
